Sentence.value: You were in the hospital to treat breathing problems that are caused by chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD).
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: You were in the hospital to treat [[breathing problems|C1260922]] that are caused by [[chronic obstructive pulmonary disease|C0024117]] (COPD).

Sentence.value: Ask your doctor whether you need to use oxygen during your activities.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Ask your [[doctor|C0031831]] whether you need to use [[oxygen|C0030054]] during your activities.
